title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 3 - Qualifications And Examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 3 - Qualifications And Examinations

State Regulations
§ 3.1 - Residence requirements for state positions
§ 3.2 - Disqualification
§ 3.3 - Qualifications for promotion
§ 3.4 - Ineligibility of promotion candidates for simultaneous open competitive examination
§ 3.5 - Rating of examinations
§ 3.6 - Establishment of eligible lists
§ 3.7 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 3

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
